title: BREAKING! Astra Concludes Tropics-1 Launch Failure Investigation
summary: Astra has concluded its investigation into the TROPICS-1 mishap that occurred on June 12, 2022, after six months of rigorous testing and analysis.

title: DoD interested in smartphone-to-satellite communications services
summary: Emerging communications services that connect phones directly to satellites are attractive to military users that operate in locations where there is no cellular network connectivity

title: NASA Awards Systems Engineering Advanced Services II Contract
summary: NASA has awarded the Systems Engineering Advanced Services (SEAS) II contract to McCallie Associates, Inc., of Bellevue, Nebraska.

title: RocketLab Considers Ending Helicopter Recovery Program
summary: Rocket Lab is reevaluating the implementation of mid-air recovery for its Electron boosters as a means to achieve reusability of the vehicle.

title: Rocket Lab reconsidering mid-air recovery of Electron boosters
summary: Rocket Lab is reconsidering the use of mid-air recovery of Electron boosters as part of its efforts to reuse the vehicle.
